verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Strive <S%H3401><s%> thou <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, with them that strive <S%H3401><s%> with me <S%H3898><s%>: Fight thou against them that fight against me <S%H3898><s%>.
Take hold <S%H2388><s%> of shield <S%H4043><s%> and buckler <S%H6793><s%>, And stand up <S%H6965><s%> for my help <S%H5833><s%>.

Draw out <S%H7324><s%> also the spear <S%H2595><s%>, and stop <S%H5462><s%> the way against <S%H7125><s%> them that pursue <S%H7291><s%> me <S%H559><s%>: Say unto my soul <S%H5315><s%>, I am thy salvation <S%H3444><s%>.

Let them be put to shame <S%H954><s%> and brought to dishonor <S%H3637><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> after my soul <S%H5315><s%>: Let them be turned <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H268><s%> and confounded <S%H2659><s%> that devise <S%H2803><s%> my hurt <S%H7451><s%>.
Let them be as chaff <S%H4671><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%>, And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> driving them on <S%H1760><s%>.
Let their way <S%H1870><s%> be dark <S%H2822><s%> and slippery <S%H2519><s%>, And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> pursuing them <S%H7291><s%>.

For without cause <S%H2600><s%> have they hid <S%H2934><s%> for me their net <S%H7568><s%> in a pit <S%H7845><s%>; Without cause <S%H2600><s%> have they digged <S%H2658><s%> a pit for my soul <S%H5315><s%>.

Let destruction <S%H7722><s%> come <S%H935><s%> upon him unawares <S%H3045><s%>; And let his net <S%H7568><s%> that he hath hid <S%H2934><s%> catch <S%H3920><s%> himself <S%H7722><s%>: With destruction let him fall therein <S%H5307><s%>.
And my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be joyful <S%H1523><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: It shall rejoice <S%H7797><s%> in his salvation <S%H3444><s%>.

All my bones <S%H6106><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, who is like unto thee <S%H5337><s%>, Who deliverest the poor <S%H6041><s%> from him that is too strong <S%H2389><s%> for him <S%H6041><s%>, Yea, the poor and the needy <S%H34><s%> from him that robbeth him <S%H1497><s%>?
Unrighteous <S%H2555><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%> rise up <S%H6965><s%>; They ask me of things <S%H7592><s%> that I know not <S%H3045><s%>.
They reward <S%H7999><s%> me evil <S%H7451><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%>, To the bereaving <S%H7908><s%> of my soul <S%H5315><s%>.

But as for me <S%H2470><s%>, when they were sick, my clothing <S%H3830><s%> was sackcloth <S%H8242><s%>: I afflicted <S%H6031><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> with fasting <S%H6685><s%>; And my prayer <S%H8605><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> into mine own bosom <S%H2436><s%>.

I behaved <S%H1980><s%> myself as though it had been my friend <S%H7453><s%> or my brother <S%H251><s%>: I bowed down <S%H7817><s%> mourning <S%H6937><s%>, as one that bewaileth <S%H57><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%>.

But in mine adversity <S%H6761><s%> they rejoiced <S%H8055><s%>, and gathered themselves together <S%H622><s%>: The abjects <S%H5222><s%> gathered themselves together <S%H622><s%> against me <S%H3045><s%>, and I knew it not <S%H7167><s%>; They did tear me <S%H1826><s%>, and ceased not:
Like the profane <S%H2611><s%> mockers <S%H3934><s%> in feasts <S%H4580><s%>, They gnashed <S%H2786><s%> upon me with their teeth <S%H8127><s%>.
Lord <S%H136><s%>, how long wilt thou look on <S%H7200><s%>? Rescue <S%H7725><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from their destructions <S%H7722><s%>, My darling <S%H3173><s%> from the lions <S%H3715><s%>.
I will give thee thanks <S%H3034><s%> in the great <S%H7227><s%> assembly <S%H6951><s%>: I will praise <S%H1984><s%> thee among much <S%H6099><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>.

Let not them that are mine enemies <S%H341><s%> wrongfully <S%H8267><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%> over me <S%H7169><s%>; Neither let them wink with the eye <S%H5869><s%> that hate <S%H8130><s%> me without a cause <S%H2600><s%>.
For they speak <S%H1696><s%> not peace <S%H7965><s%>; But they devise <S%H2803><s%> deceitful <S%H4820><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> against them that are quiet <S%H7282><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.
Yea <S%H6310><s%>, they opened their mouth wide <S%H7337><s%> against me <S%H559><s%>; They said, Aha <S%H1889><s%>, aha <S%H1889><s%>, our eye <S%H5869><s%> hath seen it <S%H7200><s%>.
Thou hast seen <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah; Keep not silence <S%H2790><s%>: O Lord <S%H136><s%>, be not far from me <S%H7368><s%>.
Stir up <S%H5782><s%> thyself <S%H6974><s%>, and awake to the justice <S%H4941><s%> due unto me <S%H7379><s%>, Even unto my cause, my God <S%H430><s%> and my Lord <S%H136><s%>.
Judge <S%H8199><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah my God <S%H430><s%>, according to thy righteousness <S%H6664><s%>; And let them not rejoice over me <S%H8055><s%>.
Let them not say <S%H559><s%> in their heart <S%H3820><s%>, Aha <S%H1889><s%>, so would we have it <S%H5315><s%>: Let them not say <S%H559><s%>, We have swallowed him up <S%H1104><s%>.

Let them be put to shame <S%H954><s%> and confounded <S%H954><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> that rejoice <S%H8056><s%> at my hurt <S%H7451><s%>: Let them be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with shame <S%H1322><s%> and dishonor <S%H3639><s%> that magnify themselves against me <S%H1431><s%>.

Let them shout for joy <S%H7442><s%>, and be glad <S%H8055><s%>, that favor <S%H2655><s%> my righteous cause <S%H6664><s%>: Yea <S%H559><s%>, let them say continually <S%H8548><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> be magnified <S%H1431><s%>, Who hath pleasure <S%H2655><s%> in the prosperity <S%H7965><s%> of his servant <S%H5650><s%>.
And my tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall talk <S%H1897><s%> of thy righteousness <S%H6664><s%> And of thy praise <S%H8416><s%> all the day long <S%H3117><s%>.
